title: June - July PGC Newsletter
subtitle: Postgrad Series and More
presidentMessage: The team behind the PGC have been hard at work putting together a series of events for this term, including a networking night, panels on research translation and postgrad parenting, workshops on public speaking and EndNote, and a seminar on rights, research and AI. The second half of the year lends itself to a lot of excitement as we gear up for the annual Arc PGC Research Awards, now in its 13th year of running, and of course, the PGC elections where you can nominate and vote for your student representatives. With something on every week from now until the end of July, it’s a great time to get involved!

highlights.title: Postgrad Series
highlights.description: Coming up: Networking Night, Public Speaking & Presenting, Research Translation Panel, Rights, Research & AI Seminar, Postgrads Parenting Panel, EndNote Workshop

highlights.title: Let's Play Soccer with PGC
highlights.description: Join us for a fun soccer match! Bring your friends to play and cheer each other on while enjoying delicious snacks. Participation and entry are free, and we'll provide the treats.

highlights.title: Arc PGC Research Awards 2024
highlights.description: Supported by the Graduate Research School, these awards celebrate the remarkable achievements of HDR students, staff, and supervisors at UNSW. Nominations close Monday, 1 July 2024.

highlights.title: Scam Safety Session: Protect Yourself!
highlights.description: In this online workshop, delve into the intricate world of scams. From phishing emails to rental fraud, equip yourself with the knowledge to spot red flags and shield yourself from financial harm.

highlights.title: Be Scam Aware
highlights.description: Scams are increasing in frequency and severity with scammers often targeting international students, including those at UNSW. Read about how to spot a scam and what to do if you fall victim to one.

highlights.title: SpeakUp at UNSW
highlights.description: If you want to speak up about something you’ve seen or experienced that doesn’t feel right, you can safely raise a concern and get the support you need.

highlights.title: UNSW Support and Development Links
highlights.description: Make the most of your time at UNSW with a range of support and development services from Wellbeing and Health to Academic Skills.
